imdb.plot outline: Exploration Health is a public television series that explores the latest breakthroughs and innovations in modern medicine and disease awareness. Doctors from renowned institutions bring the science of medicine to life with expert testimony, colorful 3D animation, and extraordinary patient stories of triumph and survival. Exploration Health promotes healthy lifestyle choices and disease awareness in an upbeat, positive format.
imdb.title: Exploration Health
plot: _Exploration Health_ (qv) is a public television series that explores the latest breakthroughs and innovations in modern medicine and disease awareness. Doctors from renowned institutions bring the science of medicine to life with expert testimony, colorful 3D animation, and extraordinary patient stories of triumph and survival. _Exploration Health_ (qv) promotes healthy lifestyle choices and disease awareness in an upbeat, positive format.::itvisus
